title: Aladdin and the magic lamp
creator_credit: lottie Reiniger Silhouette Films and Primrose Productions
brief_description: An extract from Lotte Reineger’s first major silhouette film, Prince Achmet, which had a great success among the avant-garde film movement when it was first released in Paris and Britain. This portion recounts the Arabian nights story of Aladdin. No other credits available.
